sentences.english: We sincerely hope that Thailand enjoys social harmony, economic development as well as prosperity and peace.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝願泰國社會和諧，經濟發展，國泰民安。

sentences.english: We all wish for the country to be prosperous and the people AT peace.
sentences.chinese: 我們都希望我們的國家國泰民安。

sentences.english: Reunification of the motherland, peaceful country and safe people.
